bookTitle: The Far Reaching Tentacles of N'rygoth
bookAuthors: Kurtis J. Wiebe, Roc Upchurch, Stjepan Šejić
Plot: This booze-soaked second volume of RAT QUEENS reveals a growing menace within the very walls of Palisade. And while Dee may have run from her past, the bloated, blood-feasting sky god N’rygoth never really lets his children stray too far. Collects RAT QUEENS #6-10
Characters: Dee (Rat Queens), Hannah (Rat Queens), Violet (Rat Queens), Betty (Rat Queens)
